channel.title: Militus 317 release!
channel.description:
Hello everybody! I got back from france recently, and it has come to my attention that the 317 RSPS standard is getting lower and lower, because of the amount of work getting put into these servers, almost none. My goal in releasing this project is that people will use a better base to create their next server. I am pretty much done with RSPS now, as I am 15 and they just no longer seem interesting to me. I hope everyone will benefit from this! This project was started off the Soulsplit release by Pim.
Spoiler: Links
Source Link - http://www.mediafire.com/?701qixkte7rnskq client link - http://www.mediafire.com/?yv4n4d7z7055knv cache it downloads when you run the client
Features
Never used home, cleared out Mort'ton Great Combat; No more DSPK 0's, combat following. Working KC/KD Counts, with online highscores Perfect Kalphite Queen, with transformation, and arrow above head. Added correct protect prayers. Headicon protect prayers show, and they protect. Redid entire login screen, added new login box, added new buttons! Added advanced hp, and prayer orbs, added basic run orb! Added Experiments Added Quest to Unlock Experiment Training Area Added correct quest interfaces with starting colours, progress colours, finishing colors, and correct cross outs. Added ::voting system Added custom interface for ::voting system, with buttons and item choosing for points Added Genie Lamps for 1m and 5m XP Added all RS Player Titles Added Rules on Login Interface Added guild chat instead of clan chat Fixed glitched guild chat Added New RS Fonts Added Combat Style Hit Icons with Stacking Added correct combat formulas Added correct projectiles Added the quest "Cook's Assistant" Added 508 character lighting Added Enhanced Texturizing Added Red Vengeance Skull Added Nearly Instant Switching Added New & Better Rcing System, Accessed through Zamorak Mage and Abyss. Redid Herblore System to make (unf) potions need extra ingredients to finish the potions, making (3) potions. Added Custom Donator Interface Added Donator XP Ring Added 633 Characters Added 634 Model Header Added 634 Items Added 602 Anims Added 602 GFX Added 525 mapback Added perfect switching Added Notification Bar Added New Rs Cursor Added New Bank Interface Added Perfect 602 Teleports Added Tormented Demons Added Altars switching place Added 100% Clipped Player Following Added Perfect Pk Point System Added Pk Artifact Reward System Redid Mining Skill Redid Woodcutting Skill Started a quest for you to finish Added a Mage Arena Minigame 602 Skill Interface 525 Tabarea
#i'll add some pictures sooon!

item.title: Militus 317 release!
item.dc:creator: @yourbad yourbad
item.description:
@yourbad wrote:

Hello everybody! I got back from france recently, and it has come to my attention that the 317 RSPS standard is getting lower and lower, because of the amount of work getting put into these servers, almost none. My goal in releasing this project is that people will use a better base to create their next server. I am pretty much done with RSPS now, as I am 15 and they just no longer seem interesting to me. I hope everyone will benefit from this! This project was started off the Soulsplit release by Pim.

Spoiler: Links

Source Link - http://www.mediafire.com/?701qixkte7rnskq
client link - http://www.mediafire.com/?yv4n4d7z7055knv
cache it downloads when you run the client

Features

Never used home, cleared out Mort’ton
Great Combat; No more DSPK 0’s, combat following.
Working KC/KD Counts, with online highscores
Perfect Kalphite Queen, with transformation, and arrow above head.
Added correct protect prayers. Headicon protect prayers show, and they protect.
Redid entire login screen, added new login box, added new buttons!
Added advanced hp, and prayer orbs, added basic run orb!
Added Experiments
Added Quest to Unlock Experiment Training Area
Added correct quest interfaces with starting colours, progress colours, finishing colors, and correct cross outs.
Added ::voting system
Added custom interface for ::voting system, with buttons and item choosing for points
Added Genie Lamps for 1m and 5m XP
Added all RS Player Titles
Added Rules on Login Interface
Added guild chat instead of clan chat
Fixed glitched guild chat
Added New RS Fonts
Added Combat Style Hit Icons with Stacking
Added correct combat formulas
Added correct projectiles
Added the quest “Cook’s Assistant”
Added 508 character lighting
Added Enhanced Texturizing
Added Red Vengeance Skull
Added Nearly Instant Switching
Added New & Better Rcing System, Accessed through Zamorak Mage and Abyss.
Redid Herblore System to make (unf) potions need extra ingredients to finish the potions, making (3) potions.
Added Custom Donator Interface
Added Donator XP Ring
Added 633 Characters
Added 634 Model Header
Added 634 Items
Added 602 Anims
Added 602 GFX
Added 525 mapback
Added perfect switching
Added Notification Bar
Added New Rs Cursor
Added New Bank Interface
Added Perfect 602 Teleports
Added Tormented Demons
Added Altars switching place
Added 100% Clipped Player Following
Added Perfect Pk Point System
Added Pk Artifact Reward System
Redid Mining Skill
Redid Woodcutting Skill
Started a quest for you to finish
Added a Mage Arena Minigame
602 Skill Interface
525 Tabarea

#i’ll add some pictures sooon!
